attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The interest Rate has risen 5 times since last August and a further increase is planned before the end of the year.The effect of the increases in the interest rate is having a dramatic  effect on middle england with home repossessions and personal insolvency at a 7 year high.

Using interest rate rises to punish hard working familes, will ultimatley lead to a major recession.

The Government has deceived the section of society that voted them into power in the first instance and most families are considerably worse off than they were several years ago,  in real terms as the cost of living has increased  beyond the rate of Inflation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
